title: Understanding Pharmacokinetics
text: Pharmacokinetics is a branch of pharmacology that deals with the movement of drugs within the body. It involves several processes that determine the fate of a drug after administration.

title: Key Processes in Pharmacokinetics
text: Consider the four main processes involved in pharmacokinetics: absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion. Each plays a crucial role in how a drug is processed by the body.

hintAnswer: What the human body does to a drug
title: Defining Pharmacokinetics
text: What does pharmacokinetics refer to in terms of drug interaction with the body?
